meanings.sent1: The poor dog was befleaed and scratching constantly.
meanings.sent2: The befleaed cat sought relief from the itching by grooming itself.
meanings.sent3: The befleaed squirrel performed a funny dance trying to rid itself of the pests.
meanings.sent4: The befleaed blanket felt like a prickly cactus against the skin.
meanings.sent5: The befleaed mattress was a nightmare to sleep on, with tiny bites waking up the sleeper.

meanings.sent1: The old house was befleaed, with fleas jumping around everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The befleaed carpet had to be thoroughly cleaned to get rid of the pests.
meanings.sent3: The befleaed room looked like a scene from a horror movie with fleas crawling all over.
meanings.sent4: The befleaed garden was a buzzing hub of flea activity.
meanings.sent5: The befleaed dog was constantly scratching and uncomfortable due to the flea infestation.

meanings.sent1: The befleaed cat was not allowed inside until it was treated for fleas.
meanings.sent2: The befleaed rabbit hopped around the yard, spreading fleas everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The befleaed hamster seemed to have a flea circus on its back.
meanings.sent4: The befleaed horse was causing concern among the stable workers.
meanings.sent5: The befleaed squirrel was a sight to behold, with fleas hopping around its fur.
